backend/main.mo: Actor with authorization and blob‑storage mixins defining data models for orphanages, programs, activities, people, documentation, media attachments, and timeline events, backed by map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing component purposes and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.

frontend/src/components/common/ArchiveCo: Reusable confirmation dialog for archiving items with pending-state handling.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog that previews an image and allows closing or downloading it.
frontend/src/components/common/OwnerIndi: Displays a user or principal with an avatar showing initials and optional name.
frontend/src/components/documentation/Do: Form dialog for creating or editing documentation entries, including activity selection, content editing, and attachment management.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeL: Layout for kid mode with navigation between assigned programs and attachments, plus exit controls.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeS: Selects a kid profile for kid mode, auto-selecting when only one profile exists.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with side navigation and dynamic section rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Dashboard header showing current section and user menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Renders the dashboard side navigation with section buttons and an admin-only option based on user permissions.
frontend/src/components/orphanages/Orpha: Provides a form dialog for creating or editing orphanage records with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/people/PersonDia: Displays a dialog for adding or viewing a person, handling basic validation and create operations.
frontend/src/components/programs/MyFocus: Shows the current user's open activities and next upcoming events with loading states.

Displays an image preview dialog with options to close or download the file.
Renders a monthly calendar for a program, displaying schedule events and allowing admins to add or archive events.
frontend/src/components/programs/Schedul: Dialog form for creating schedule events, handling input, validation, timestamp construction, and submission.
frontend/src/components/sprint/SprintBoa: Displays an activity card in a sprint board with program info, owner, status, and optional detailed fields.

frontend/src/hooks/data/useActivityAttac: Provides hooks for listing, uploading, downloading, and deleting activity attachments, including chunked file uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useAdminUsers.ts: React-query hooks for listing users, updating user roles, and fetching individual user profiles via the actor API.

frontend/src/hooks/data/useOrphanages.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and archiving orphanages with fallback to sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePeople.ts: Handles listing, searching, creating, and archiving people records filtered to active, non-archived entries.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useProgramAttach: Supports listing, uploading, downloading, and filtering program media attachments with chunked uploads and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePrograms.ts: Provides hooks to list, create, update, and archive programs with fallback sample data and timeline invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useScheduleEvent: Enables listing, creating, and archiving schedule events per program with related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidContext: Kid profile hooks for listing, fetching, selecting, and clearing active kid context using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidProgram: Hooks to fetch kid-assigned programs and media attachments based on the active kid context.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Provides hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s user profile, role, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Hooks to fetch one or many user profiles by principal with caching and safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Custom hook syncing a React state value with sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base config with light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names with clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/activities/Activities: Activities management page with filtering, creation, archiving, and owner profile lookup.
Lists user accounts for admins and allows updating user roles with feedback handling.
frontend/src/pages/documentation/Documen: Displays, filters, creates, views, and archives documentation entries with search and activity filtering.

frontend/src/pages/organizations/Organiz: Manages orphanages with search, creation, editing, and archiving.
frontend/src/pages/people/PeoplePage.tsx: Manages people records with search, role filtering, creation, viewing, and archiving.
